logout.title: Logout
logout.message: Are you sure you want to logout?
logout.success: You have been logged out successfully.

welcome-component.title: Welcome to,
welcome-component.subtitle: CODERINE
welcome-component.paragraph-1: Are you an online content creator? Do you like sharing your creations with the community and receiving feedback?
welcome-component.paragraph-2: Then, our application is perfect for you. In it, you can share your creative projects with other users and receive likes and comments in real-time.
welcome-component.paragraph-3: Additionally, you can save your creations and view the history of your projects in one place.
welcome-component.paragraph-4: In our application, you can express yourself creatively and receive validation and support from other users who share your interests.
welcome-component.paragraph-5: Join our community and share your creations with the world. Sign up now and start sharing your projects with a global audience!

alert.title: Save component
alert.text: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to save them?, place a name for your component.
alert.error: An error occurred while saving the component.
